Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding wild-type or mutant hSCN5A.

Readout description.Result Description: The I-V curve of the mutant channel showed an increase in current density and a rightward shift in the voltage-dependence of activation compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed with different batches of cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated five times to ensure reproducibility.

Basic positive control.Description: Recordings from wild-type hSCN5A were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Recordings from untransfected HEK293 cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test for comparison between wild-type and mutant channels.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Current density within the range of wild-type hSCN5A.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Current density significantly greater than that of wild-type hSCN5A.
